name: gogs
description: Gogs is a simple, self-hosted Git service with a fast UI and minimal resource usage. It supports code hosting, pull requests, issues, and runs easily on small servers, intended for personal or small team use.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted Git service with extremely low resource requirements and fast performance

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Clean, straightforward web UI focused on essential Git operations

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Track bugs and features with a lightweight issue management system

features.title: Repository Management
features.description: Create, fork, and manage Git repositories through the web interface

features.title: User Management
features.description: Support for multiple users and organizations with basic permission controls

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Trigger external services on push, pull request, and other repository events

features.title: Small Server Friendly
features.description: Runs efficiently on Raspberry Pi and other low-powered hardware
